name: 11.16 "Is There a Doctor in the Howe?" Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Norm.

	He said the R stood for "resourceful". He kept painting those letters on the outside Cheers wall. Then while Sam was cleaning it off, he and Cliff had free beers.

questions.text: Who did Frasier supposedly get a telegram from?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	It said that their marriage was over. Frasier took the news very hard.

questions.text: What did Cliff say the post office's success rate was?
questions.explanation:
Almost 50%.

	He told Norm that was true, unless it was raining. There have been many jokes since the beginning of "Cheers" about how slow and inaccurate the post office mail delivery was.

questions.text: How old was Cliff when his mother moved to Florida?
questions.explanation:
37.

	Cliff was comparing that to Lilith leaving Frasier. Cliff's mother had since moved back to Boston.

questions.text: What kind of a party did Rebecca want to throw for Frasier?
options: Congratulations on your new job party
questions.explanation:
Divorce party.

	She wanted him to know all his friends cared about him. Sam thought it sounded strange, but Norm thought it made perfect sense.

questions.text: What did the first toast say?
questions.explanation:
Lilith stinks!.

	Rebecca made the first toast. Frasier said he didn't want it to be a "bash Lilith party".

questions.text: What did Cliff say he must look like?
questions.explanation:
A Cliff.

	He was talking about how sleazy the people were who went to the strip clubs. Then the stripper said, "Oh look, it's Cliff."

Rebecca.

	This made them both feel uncomfortable at first. Then they did it again feeling more attraction than discomfort.

questions.text: Who got drunk and passed out at the bar?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody hardly ever drank until at the party, so he couldn't hold much alcohol. He became very insulting the more he drank.

questions.text: Do Frasier and the person he kissed have sex?
questions.explanation:
No.

	They were going to but some of the guys from Cheers showed up at his house. Then when he did get upstairs and went to get ready, Lilith showed up.
